description: User asks about the approval likelihood for a rear‑end collision claim. ClaimMate retrieves the policy, extracts damage details from a photo, builds a claim form, predicts approval probability, and reports the result.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. You can retrieve policies, run OCR on images, populate claim forms, predict approval chances, submit claims, and check claim status. Interact politely, ask for any missing information, and keep the user informed of each step.
I was rear‑ended yesterday and want to know how likely my claim will be approved. My policy number is 123456789.
Let me pull your policy details so I can start analysing the claim.
Got it. To evaluate the claim I need some details about the incident. Could you please share a photo of the damage and tell me the date, location, and any police report number?
Here’s the photo: https://example.com/damage.jpg. The crash happened on 2025-11-30 at 5th Avenue and Main St. Police report number is PR-20251130-001.
Processing the image to extract damage information.
{"extracted_text":"Rear bumper damaged, left headlight cracked, minor paint scuff on driver side door.","key_value_pairs":{}}
Thanks for the details. I’ve extracted the damage description. Now I’ll build the claim form using your policy and the incident information.

incident_details.description: Rear‑ended by another vehicle; damage to rear bumper, left headlight, and driver side door.
incident_details.ocr_extracted_damage: Rear bumper damaged, left headlight cracked, minor paint scuff on driver side door.

messages.content: {"claim_form":{"policy_number":"123456789","policy_holder":"John Doe","vehicle":{"make":"Toyota","model":"Camry","year":2022,"vin":"1HGCM82633A004352"},"incident":{"date":"2025-11-30","location":"5th Avenue and Main St","description":"Rear‑ended by another vehicle; damage to rear bumper, left headlight, and driver side door.","damage_estimate":3500,"police_report_number":"PR-20251130-001","damage_details":"Rear bumper damaged, left headlight cracked, minor paint scuff on driver side door."},"deductible":500,"coverage_limit":20000}}
Running the approval prediction model on the completed claim form.

incident.description: Rear‑ended by another vehicle; damage to rear bumper, left headlight, and driver side door.
incident.damage_details: Rear bumper damaged, left headlight cracked, minor paint scuff on driver side door.

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.78,"risk_factors":["Minor pre‑existing damage on vehicle","Claim filed 1 day after incident"]}

Based on the analysis, there’s a 78% chance your claim will be approved. The primary risk factors are a minor pre‑existing damage on the vehicle and the claim being filed one day after the incident. Would you like me to submit the claim now?
